name: DisclosureGroup
desc: A view that shows or hides another content view, based on the state of a disclosure control.

items.name: init<S>(S, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a disclosure group, using a provided string to create a text view for the label.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a disclosure group, using a provided localized string key to create a text view for the label.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, isExpanded: Binding<Bool>, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a disclosure group, using a provided localized string key to create a text view for the label, and a binding to the expansion state (expanded or collapsed).

items.name: init<S>(S, isExpanded: Binding<Bool>, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a disclosure group, using a provided string to create a text view for the label, and a binding to the expansion state (expanded or collapsed).

items.name: init(content: () -> Content, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a disclosure group with the given label and content views.

items.name: init(isExpanded: Binding<Bool>, content: () -> Content, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a disclosure group with the given label and content views, and a binding to the expansion state (expanded or collapsed).

items.name: var body: some View
items.desc: The content and behavior of the view.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of view representing the body of this view.

declaration: struct DisclosureGroup<Label, Content> where Label : View, Content : View
